keyMoments.title: Donquixote Pirates' Spy Network Revealed
keyMoments.description: Vergo reveals he and Monet were sent to Punk Hazard as spies by the Donquixote Pirates to monitor Caesar Clown.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the extent of Doflamingo's influence and his distrust of Caesar despite their partnership.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with a crown and sunglasses with crossed bones behind it
